lyrics_abstract:
Lay down, lay down
Lay it all down 
Let your white birds smile up 
At the ones who stand and frown 
Lay down, lay down
Lay it all down  
Let your white birds smile up
At the ones who stand and frown 

We  were so close, there was no room 
We bled inside each other's wounds 
We  all had caught the same [...]
